description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Leek Couscous recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef & Leek Couscous Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium hot fresh red chillies (deseeded and finely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 150°C. Heat the oil in a large heavy-based pan, add the leeks, and cook over a medium heat for 5 minutes. Add the mince and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes, or until no longer pink.

Stir in the chillies, paprika, and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Pour in the wine and cook for 3 minutes, then add the stock and parsley and combine well. Stir in the couscous, then cover with a lid and cook in the oven for 15 minutes. Stir well and serve.
